resources.string: You have received a new message from developer.
Oops! The purchase has not completed successfully.
Hurray! Permissions have been granted successfully.
Oops! The permissions have not been granted. Without granting the permissions the app is limited in functionality.

Once when a lion, the king of the jungle, was asleep, a little mouse began running up and down on him. This soon awakened the lion, who placed his huge paw on the mouse, and opened his big jaws to swallow him.
Press back once more to exit
